db:info.db:title: Qt OPC UA
db:info.db:titleabbrev: An OPC UA module for Qt

db:abstract.db:para: Implements OPC UA connectivity through a Qt API.

db:para.db:emphasis: This documentation is under development and is subject to change.

db:article.db:para: The Qt OPC UA module implements a Qt API to interact with OPC UA servers on top of the open62541 library.
The QML API is still in development but are available as a technology preview. This means those parts are unstable, likely to change, and provided as a convenience only.

db:section.db:title: C++ API
db:section.db:para: Using the C++ API requires linking against the module library, either directly or through other dependencies. Several build tools have dedicated support for this, including CMake and qmake.

db:section.db:title: Building with CMake
db:section.db:para: Use the find_package() command to locate the needed module components in the Qt6 package:
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS OpcUa) target_link_libraries(mytarget Qt::OpcUa)
